attributes.action: Fairer priced car insurance for all first time drivers
attributes.additional_details:
Fairer priced car insurance for all first time drivers
After taking lessons for over 2 year and several attempts at my driving test I finally passed I spent over £4,000 just on learning how to drive and taking test

The next step was to buy a car but the car insurance were higher then the price of the car

Insurance quoted from £2,000-£4,000

Now if I’m honest do we really have that kind of money in our bank accounts to pay all at once?

I don’t know what you think but this is day light robbery – these insurance companies are robbing us and we can’t even do anything about it

The government needs to put a stop to this and bring in regulations on more affordable insurance for new drivers

We want the government to bring in Regulation that every Quote needs to be fair and affordable as no one has £2,000-£5,000 cash to pay upfront to this billion dollar industry
